channel.title: Restore pots where armour should go
channel.description: I have a 474 server and Where the armour shows what your wareing it has restore pots in the slots and also has an extra one in the middle of the tap equipment stats and items kept on death. Could any one help me fix? what file I should look in and change. the pic of it is below =/ [img]http://img126.imageshack.us/img126/3647/errori.png[/img]

item.title: Restore pots where armour should go
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

kk, lemme look again lol sec[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 23, 2009, 11:35:46 pm[/size][hr]Not sure… Because this code should have done it:

		for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++) {
			playerEquipment[i] = -1;
			playerEquipmentN[i] = -1;
		}

Read full topic

item.title: Restore pots where armour should go
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

int playerEquipment[] = new int[14];

This isn’t it because it just states a new int with 14 values.

What base are you using?

Read full topic
item.source: Restore pots where armour should go

item.title: Restore pots where armour should go
item.dc:creator: @hotwater hotwater
item.description:
@hotwater wrote:

my server i got 2 folders that spits files, in RSInstance there a file RSPlayer.java and has this if (playerEquipment[playerShield] > 0) { str.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerShield]); // shield } else { str.writeByte(0);

and in the other folder server the player.java does have either the code i put or the code you wanted me to look for. The closest to the code is this int playerEquipment[] = new int[14];

Read full topic

thank you for the welcome.
